entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
